case.title: Life is a Miracle - Every Single Day (london )
case.text: hi Cosmopolitan, intellectual, and rather attractive woman, interesting and funny with a great personality and that certain something which makes people look twice ;) I'm 36, SWF, 5'3", fit and curvy, feminine and pretty, wavy light brown hair, beautiful green eyes, radiant smile, dancer's posture. I'm outgoing and cheerful, witty and fun, educated, with a job that i love, complicated yet amazing life overall
